title: Extracellular Vesicles for the Treatment of Syringomyelia
desc: This is a open-label, single-arm, dose escalation phase I clinical trial. The goal of this clinical trial is to evaluate the safety and preliminary efficacy of Intrathecal injection human umbilical cord-derived mesenchymal stromal cell-derived extracellular vesicle (hUC-MSC-sEV) in syringomyelia.
